text: today I'm gonna show you a master muffin
batter that you can use with just about
any fruit and nut mix I'm gonna start
with the batter itself add a half a
stick of unsalted butter at room
temperature 3/4 of a cup of granulated
sugar and I'm gonna cream this together
until it's light and fluffy
while my butter and sugar is creaming
together I'm going to sift together my
dry ingredients so I have one in 3/4
cups of all-purpose flour in a
medium-sized Bowl and to this add 1 and
1/2 teaspoons of baking powder and 3/4
of a teaspoon of coarse salt so sift
this together using a wire whisk so this
looks just about right I have one large
egg and one large egg yolk add them one
at a time to the butter and sugar
mixture and to this add our flavoring
which is one teaspoon of vanilla extract
and now the flour mixture and can milled
you want to make sure that you start
with your dry ingredients at about half
and an alternate it with the wet
ingredients which I'm using 2/3 of a cup
of whole milk here and then the rest of
the flour mixture and you just want to
mix this until it comes together just
like that so this is good to go
you now have a basic muffin batter that
you can use the possibilities are
endless
